content: Name a bird that can fly higher than an eagle, but also has a body length greater than 1 meter and weighs at least 15 kilograms.

The Andean condor is a bird that fits your criteria. It is known to fly at high altitudes, higher than eagles, and has a body length of over 1 meter. Additionally, the Andean condor is one of the heaviest flying birds, with males typically weighing around 11 to 15 kilograms, and some even heavier.
